message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $8000 by both you and us. Considering its high quality and unmatched features, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $7200. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that truly exceeds expectations. Please let me know if this offer meets your requirements and if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.
